---
title: Runtime Upgrade Checklist
---

## Node
### Runtime Upgrade
- **Compatible with previous versions**
  - [ ] **Darwinia**
  - [ ] **Crab**
- **Fork off Substrate**
  - [ ] **Darwinia**
  - [ ] **Crab**
- **Try runtime**
  - [ ] **Darwinia**
  - [ ] **Crab**

### Running
- **Able to run more than an era without any error**
  - [ ] **Darwinia**
  - [ ] **Crab**

cc @AurevoirXavier
